quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"superlate"（超级晚的）或词根误解（将"superlative"拆为"super+late"）而误判为"超级晚的"或"超级大的"。
quiz_item.sentence: In English grammar, adjectives like "tallest" and "most beautiful" are in the **superlative** degree, indicating the highest level of a quality.

option.definition: （语法）最高级的（表示最高程度的形式）
